#### Overview

The [Sentinel-3 SYN Level 2 ](https://sentinels.copernicus.eu/web/sentinel/missions/sentinel-3/data-products/synergy){target='blank'} product is a higher-level processed product that contains information about the Earth's atmosphere and its constituents.  It is derived from the Level-1 and Level-2 products of the OLCI and SLSTR instruments on board the Sentinel-3 satellite.
